index-description: Fake news are misleading or fabricated information, often intended to manipulate. Would you like to learn more about their effects and how to recognize them?
homepage-description: Here on this page, youâ€™ll encounter fake news and receive training on how to handle it more confidently. There are various cool methods to improve your approach to dealing with fake news. We tackle it all playfully, in the form of a quiz and a stylish freeze-frame video.
